statements: SELECT * FROM user_feedback ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id = 100
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM user_feedback WHERE feedback_id BETWEEN 1 AND 10
SELECT * FROM user_feedback WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM user_feedback
SELECT * FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM user_feedback WHERE feedback_id > 100 AND user_id = 3;
SELECT MAX(feedback_id) AS max_feedback_id FROM user_feedback;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id IN (2, 4, 6) ORDER BY user_id ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS feedback_count FROM user_feedback GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(feedback_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, created_at FROM feedback ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT suggestion_text, vote_count FROM suggestions WHERE vote_count > 100 ORDER BY vote_count DESC;
SELECT user_id, suggestion_text, created_at FROM suggestions WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, created_at FROM feedback WHERE feedback_id > 1000;
SELECT suggestion_text, vote_count FROM suggestions WHERE user_id = 456 ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM suggestions WHERE vote_count > 50;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text, created_at FROM feedback WHERE user_id = 789;
SELECT * FROM UserFeedback;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM UserFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM FeatureSuggestions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, suggestion_text FROM FeatureSuggestions WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT last_login, total_feedback_received FROM UserActivity WHERE total_feedback_received > 10;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM UserFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM FeatureSuggestions WHERE status = 'approved' ORDER BY suggestion_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_feedbacks FROM UserFeedback GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_feedbacks DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM UserFeedback GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY average_rating DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, last_login, total_feedback_received, total_suggestions_made FROM UserActivity ORDER BY last_login DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_feedback;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text, timestamp FROM user_feedback ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT feature_name, description FROM platform_features WHERE implementation_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT user_id, suggestion_text FROM user_suggestions WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT feedback_id, reply_text FROM feedback_replies ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM user_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%improve%';
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM user_feedback WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM platform_features WHERE implementation_status = 'pending' ORDER BY feature_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, suggestion_text, timestamp FROM user_suggestions WHERE suggestion_text IS NOT NULL AND user_id = 456 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE feedback_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT submission_date, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT feature_name, feature_description FROM features WHERE feature_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE submission_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT f.feature_name, r.rating FROM features f JOIN ratings r ON f.feature_id = r.feature_id;
SELECT u.username, s.suggestion_text FROM users u INNER JOIN suggestions s ON u.user_id = s.user_id;
SELECT * FROM feedback ORDER BY submission_date DESC LIMIT 5;
